item.description:
In Movie Theaters: January 13, 2012 Nationwide
Directed by: Baltasar Kormaur

Starring:  Mark Wahlberg

Kate Beckinsale

Ben Foster

 Giovanni Ribisi Caleb

Landry Jones

Lukas Haas

Distributed by: Universal Pictures MPAA

Rating: R for violence, pervasive language and brief drug use. Genres: Thriller Suspense Action

 Synopsis: The plot centers on a security guard and former alcohol smuggler on the Iceland-Netherlands route who is tempted back into illicit business by a dubious friend after encountering financial problems.

 

 PS: time might change but its defnitly before 6 pm
item.name: SUNDAY MOVIE: CONTRABAND
